title: Holidaying in the UK this summer? Hire a Coach (Vincent J)
text: By Vincent J Aug 27, 2015 The days are long and the weather's looking good. The time is perfect for exploring the rest of the country on a short break. Lake District, Cotswolds, Northumberland, seaside, city breaks... Pick out the places you want to see, get a group of friends and family together and off you go. Whatever you're thinking of doing, you can take the stress out of planning and travelling if you opt for hiring a coach.Why? Because you won't have to worry about the logistics of making sure everyone can get there. You won't have the stress of driving and navigating like you would if you went by car, or booking tickets and making connections if you were travelling by rail. A hired coach takes all of these worries away and provides a lovely atmosphere for a group of people to get to know each other and talk while travelling about.Coach hire is all about making things easier for you while you're on holiday. A coach can take care of your luggage and make sure everyone travels comfortably together. You can just sit back and relax - and enjoy the views! Here at Safeguard Coaches in Guildford we provide coach hire Surrey. We have a range of vehicles to suit your needs. We can handle 16 to 57 passengers, all with air conditioning, DVD and CD playing facilities and refreshments.We can help you plan your routes, recommend accommodation and things to do. Our experienced drivers will be able to tell you about the places you travel. We can also organize blue badge guides to show you the sights if you'd like. We'll happily plan everything for you. Or we can work with your plans to ensure everybody has the best trip. We love discussing new travel ideas with people.So whatever you're thinking of doing please get in touch.
